actions.recommendation: Your BMI was reported slightly high on your report, but this is likely due to an increased muscle mass from strength training and is not concerning. For further information on body mass, see report from Biokineticist.
Regular prostate screening as you get older is important for early detection of any abnormalities & early intervention. Continue to monitor for any side effects with your hair loss treatment.
Making some adjustments to your diet will hopefully improve your currently raised cholesterol levels.

Overall, you have a good baseline and have been building some good lifestyle habits over the past few years. Improving and maintaining these will benefit not only your current well-being but also your long term health.

doctors: Dr. Jessica Koen or Not specified
